[h1] Ein absoluter Klassiker [/h1]

Half-Life - Wer kennt es nicht? Valves großer Durchbruch und die Mutter der modernen Ego-Shooter. Kaum ein anderes Spiel hatte einen so großen Einfluss auf die Spieleszene, wie dieser Titel. Selbst im Jahre 2016 macht es unglaublich viel Spaß, sich als Dr. Gordon Freeman durch das Firmengelände der Black Mesa zu kämpfen und die Welt zu retten. 

[u] Gameplay [/u]

Als junger, ambitionierter Wissenschaftler beginnt man seine gewohnte Morgenroutine und muss direkt als Versuchskaninchen ein gefährliches Experiment mit unerforschten Mineralen durchführen. Man selbst spielt Dr. Gordon Freeman, der sich trotz seiner akademischen Bildung noch am unteren Ende der Firmenhierarchie der Black Mesa Facility befindet. Das an diesem Tag durchgeführte Experiment wird fatale Folgen haben. Aliens können durch eine Art Portal in die Institution eindringen und versuchen die Überhand zu gewinnen. Im Verlauf des Spieles muss man nicht nur gegen diese Außerirdischen durchsetzen, sondern auch gegen das Militär, welches versucht Alles und Jeden daran zu hindern, das Firmengelände zu verlassen. Mr. Freeman kann sich durch neue Waffen und seine Rüstung, den HEV, durchsetzen und bewahrt die Welt zu guter Letzt vor dem Untergang. 

[u] Retro durch und durch [/u]

Alles, was Dr. Freeman braucht, ist sein HEVsuit und seine Pistole. Eine 4k Grafik ist für den Spielspaß und die Story besonders hier nicht von Nöten, sondern eher Kontraproduktiv. Bei der erzählten Geschichte sind ebenfalls klassische Elemente aufzufinden. So ist zum Beispiel der Spieler der Einzige, der in der Lage ist die Apokalypse abzuwenden. 
Die Optik des Spiels mag zwar itzund eher belächelt werden, aber gerade sie verleiht Half-Life seinen Charme.

[u] Herausforderung, Action und Spaß zugleich [/u]

Diesen Spagat haben bis jetzt nur wenige Spiele bewältigen können. Die Ausgewogenheit von Half-Life hinsichtlich der bereits genannten Punkte ist beachtenswert und für den Spieler deutlich fühlbar. Selbst wenn ein Level nicht absolviert werden konnte, man schon zum fünften Mal an der selben Stelle gescheitert ist oder der Boss unbesiegbar scheinen mag, kann der Spieler nicht aufgeben. Dabei färben Ehrgeiz und Ausdauer des Protagonisten auf den Spielenden ab. Daran ist deutlich zu erkennen, wie gut sich die Mehrheit der Spieler mit Gordon identifizieren können, was das Spiel noch sympathischer und realer erscheinen lässt.
Nichts kommt bei Half-Life zu kurz und Jeder kommt bei diesem Titel auf seine Kosten.

[u] Klassikerbonus [/u]

Ich habe bereits erwähnt, dass Half-Life als Klassiker und Meilenstein bezeichnet und in den siebten Himmel gelobt wird. Dies ist jedoch nicht der Klassikerbonus, den viele andere Spiele erhalten. Lob und Anerkennung sind bei dem ersten Auftritt von Dr. Freeman auf jeden Fall angebracht und verdient. Viele Spieler (inklusive meiner Wenigkeit) sind der Meinung, dass Jeder, der von sich behauptet ein Gamer zu sein, die Half-Life-Reihe gespielt haben sollte. Dieser Gedanke ist aufgrund der vorhergegangenen Punkte weder unbegründet, noch übertrieben. 

[u]Wertung[/u]
[list]
[*] [b]Stroy[/b][u] 97/100[/u]
Von Anfang bis Ende wird die Geschichte um die Black-Mesa-Facility ohne Unstimmigkeiten anschaulich erzählt.
[*] [b] Grafik [/b][u] 90/100[/u]
Im Vergleich zu damaligen Standards war die Grafik atemberaubend. Es ist klar, dass ein 18 Jahre altes Spiel mit der Optik moderner Bestseller nicht mithalten kann. Dennoch ist die Grafik stimmig und verleiht Half-Life Atmosphäre und Charme.
[*] [b] Sound [/b] [u]98/100[/u]
Der Sound macht genau das, was er machen soll. Er erzeugt in jeder Situation die passende Stimmung.
[*] [b] Atmosphäre[/b] [u]97/100[/u]
Wie bereits angesprochen ist die Atmosphäre durch den perfekten Einsatz von Sound und Optik einmalig und auch in der heutigen Zeit ein Maßstab.
[*] [b] Map [/b] [u] 96/100 [/u]
Weitreichend und dennoch nicht unübersichtlich. 
[*][b] Spaß [/b] [u]100/100 [/u]
Egal, wie oft man es durchgespielt hat, macht Half-Life durchgehend Spaß.
[/list]
[b] Gesamt[/b] [u] 96/100[/u]

[u] Fazit [/u]

Anhand der aufgezählten Eigenschaften von Half-Life muss ich zum Ende meiner Rezension eine klare [b]Kaufempfehlung[/b] aussprechen. Seiner nicht mehr zeitgemäßen Grafik zum Trotz ist dieser Titel auch heutzutage noch spielenswert und ein Muss. Die abstruse Story und die innovativen, schier unbegrenzten Möglichkeiten machen HL zu einem der besten Spiele aller Zeiten. 
Nicht zuletzt verdanken wir alle diesem Spiel andere heißgeliebte Spiele, wie zum Beispiel "CounterStrike" oder "Day of Defeat".

[spoiler]ACHTUNG: In Deutschland ist auf Steam nur die geschnittene Fassung erhältlich. Durch Communitymods kann aber auch in der BRD die volle Bandbreite an Unterhaltung genossen werden. [/spoiler]

Amazing experience!
When I was little, I used to casually play HF1 and 2, as well as CS1.6 and Source with my father, but never tried to play by myself. Also, english isn't my primary language, so I never undestood what was happening.
Now, as I decided to play all the Half Lifes chronologically, it's just INCREDIBLE! A series like this really deserves its place at the heart of gamers.
Already played HF1, Opposing Force and Blue Shift, now going to the savage land known as HF2.
Oh, I didn't play the Black Mesa "remastered" version, but as I don't care that much about graphics, I found the experience with the old engine pretty unique
9/10

Where do I begin... There is a lot I have to say, and while most of it will seem a bit negative, I wish to start this review with the preface that I throughly enjoyed the game. While I don't think it is the best thing in the world, it doesn't stray away from the fact that I had a lot of fun.


I'll start with what I loved about it. I lovcd the characters, the guns, the Sci-Fi elements (by that i mean it feels actually Sci-Fi and not science fantasy). The level designs in general were pretty great, and a lot of it had me thinking as to where I should be going next.


I will go on to what I really didn't like. There seemed to be really no personality with the scientists and security guards (while I understand this is an old game, this is coming from someone using a modern perspective and not a nostalgic one). I have not played Black Mesa yet, but I hope they addressed this issue. I also didn't like some parts of the level design, like for example, in one of the later levels, the only way to progress to the next section is a very difficult hole to spot which from the players perspective doesn't look like you would fit through. I had to look up a video walkthrough to get past that section. The last boss fight was hard, and not in the fun way, but more tedious than anything, but I think it was because I wasn't thinking in the right mind set. And something I absolutely dispised was that ALL THE TIME IT FELT LIKE I WAS WALKING ON ICE AND I ALWAYS SOMEHOW MANAGED TO MISS MY JUMPS!!!

But other than that I was honestly just nit picking. 

Overall, this game is fast, fun, and I'm very excited to start Half-Life 2 here in a few days.

Ich liebe dieses Spiel und spiele es schon seit release aber... Ich fand es schon erschreckend, wie hart das Half-Life in Deutschland zensiert wurde, aber die Steam-Version ist da ja noch krasser. Hat mich sehr traurig gemacht, der alte Spielspaß ging flöten, spiele nun das original von meiner 98er GOTY-CD..

Lässt man die unnützen Zensuren weg, ist Half-Life natürlich ein verdammt gutes Spiel. Viel Action, viel Horror, eine unglaubliche Story, die mehr Fragen aufwirft als beantwortet. 

Wer Half-Life nach fast 20 Jahren immernoch nicht gespielt hat, sollte dies bald tun, es lohnt sich!

8/10 (wegen deutscher Zensur) 10/10 (US-original)

Definitely one of my all time favorites.  I bought a steam bundle like 3 years ago and I have not once regretted that purchase. Half life has became one of my favorite games to ever experience.  If you're looking at this as late as I am you may be wondering about the age of the game. We'll I'll tell you this. Had I know half life was this good on its release back in the day it'd have ruined me. Because if you think back to the year this was made and compare it with other games of the time you'll be at a loss of words. Like why weren't other games this good? Anyway it's a great game and aged very well with time. I'd def replay it and still have fun.

If you want a solid shooter that provides, exciting gameplay, a movie worthy story, and kick as music, Half-life is the game for you. Before you pick up that next copy of Call of duty, give Half-life a try and experience the game that not only put Valve on the map of brilliance for gaming everywhere but really defined the modern shooter genre alltogether.

Yes the controls my be kind of difficult to adjust to because of their speed and the game's difficulty may catch the player off guard at times but thsi game was really the first of its kind outside of Doom and the fact that it's still a good time after nearly 18 years is an accomplishment.

Игра хорошая, тут не поспоришь. Отличный геймплей. Очень странный ИИ: когда это противник, он ебашит только так, а когда союзник, хочется отправить его куда подальше. . Дизайн локаций в норме, не считая кнопок и рычагов, которые сливаются с окружением. Монстры очень душевные и запоминающиеся. Сюжет, правда, такой себе, но колде это не мешает выходить каждый год. Мне,  как "новому поколению, которому не понять",  воспринимать этот шутан как Шедевр, сложно. Видимо, все так носятся с ним, потому что для своего времени он был чем-то новым. Скажем так, игра хорошая, но не лучшая во всём свете. 8/10.

Good game if you like seeing the evolution of games that are specifically valve or just FPS games in general. It is the first game that pioneered the use of linear story telling in an fps game because before this we had games that just had only gameplay like doom or games that were multiplayer focused. If the low res graphics really bug you for some strange reason even though the game was made in 1998 then get the Black Mesa Source remake.

It isn't everyday that you come across a game that totally revolutionizes an entire genre, but Half-Life has done just that.

Düşünüyorum anlatmama gerek varmı diye. Oyunu çocukken bitirmiştim birdaha bitirmek için aldım ama bitirirken senaryoyuda iyice anlamak için altyazı modu kurdum kurunca başka bir oyunmuş gibi oynanıyor falan filan oyunu yeni bitirdim yani şu an 2 yada 3 saat yazıyor altyazı modu yüzünden yani yapan arkadaşlara teşşekürler ellerine sağlık çok güzel olmuş.Size Half Life'ı kısaca anlatim bir deney yapılıyor sonra birşeyler oluyor ve Xen le dünya arasında bir bağ oluşuyor Xen deki yaratıkların çoğu dünyaya geliyor ve hükümet çok şey bildiğimiz için tüm Black Mesa çalışanlarını öldürmeye çalışıyor daha olan olaylarda var gelişmeler falan fakat daha fazla işin içine girersem senaryoyu anlatırım oynayın (oynamayan varmı ki ?). Oyun zaten gelmiş geçmiş en iyi oyun seçildi ve evet sonuna kadar hak ediyor nedenmi anlatayım.Bulmaca ve aksiyon dan oluşan bir oyun fakat oyun bu ikisini öyle güzel harmanlamışki sabah başladım akşam son bölme geldim ve farketmedim o kadar zevkli.Grafikler zamanına göre oldukça güzel bana kalsa tüm grafikler bu oyunuki gibi yapılabilir çünkü bu oyun grafigin oyunlar için önemsiz olduğunu anlatıyor.Sürekli olmasada bosslarla karşılaşmak heycanlı yani durmadan boss çıkan oyunlarda "yav yeter yeter bıktım artık" diye bağıran biriyim ama bu oyunda senaryo ilerlerken arada bir boss çıkıyor bosslar hep değil genelde aynı oluyor ama aynı bossla bile herzaman aynı şekilde savaşmıyoruz aynı bossu bi kere trenle öldürüyoruz bi kere üzerine bilgisayardan bomba göndererek.Ben bir oyunda duygu olarak gizem ve heyecan beklerim bu oyunda gizem var o gizem G-MAN fakat sadece G-MAN değil ana karakterimiz Gordon Freeman da başlıca bir gizem Black Mesa Çalışanları ona çok güveniyor fakat ben Gordon'ın hiç konuştuğunu duymadım ama kendisini hep sevicez.Birde Silahlara Gelelim Half Life ta bol bol silah var hepsini zamanla açıyoruz silah çeşitlilği çok olsada ben genelde pompalı ile ilerledim tabi sizin tercihiniz hiç bir zaman "şu bossu kesmek için şu silahı kullanman gerek" demiyor buda oyunu sevmem için güzel bir şey çünkü beni asla bir şey için zorlamıyor zorladığı tek şey hep ilerlemem gerektiği.


ARTILAR

+Sıkmayan Oyun Yapısı
+Olağanüstü Senaryo
+Güzel Boss Fightlar
+G-MAN
+Silah Çeşitliliği
+Başka Bir Oyundan Edinemiyeceğiniz Bir Deneyim

Overall don't miss out on this classic. Even today in 2017 it holds up, with fun and innuitive gameplay.
Don't miss it!

5/5

This is a classic FPS if not THE classic FPS. 

I can't really say anything wrong about this game--it covered all its bases. It has a plethora of weaponry, enemies, environments. Honestly though I don't know if this game deserves a "5/5" but I'm giving it a free pass because the game is a bit dated, but it has aged relatively well. Compared to more modern games, it seems a bit boring without bringing anything original or unique, but for its time, it was truly a "must-play" FPS. 

This game takes you from a lab crawling with security guards and aliens to a military facility with tanks and enemy soldiers to an alternate dimensions with terrifying alien monsters waiting to tear you to pieces. 

Do you like to shoot stuff with pistols, shotguns, automatic weapons, crossbows, alien technology? 

Do you like a little bit of a puzzle every now and then? 

Do you like to experience a pure-bred FPS that took the world by storm?

This game belongs in the FPS Hall of Fame alongside Halo: Combat Evolved, Doom, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare, and Goldeneye 007. 

Truly a classic.
Çocukluğumuzun efsane oyunudur kendileri.

A mio avviso è un gioco interessantissimo ancora oggi,nel giocarlo per la prima volta nel 2015 ho riscoperto tutte le innovazioni importanti degli fps.
In quanto ai combattimenti,avendo giocato con alla modalità difficile,devo dire che sono veramente impegnativi e necessitano di abilità e pazienza per essere terminati con successo (in alcuni tratti uccidevo un nemico,salvavo e venivo immediatamente dopo ucciso).
La storia è avvincente e c'è anche da considerare il fatto che questo gioco è stato uno dei primi con una trama ben elaborata.
Un gioco che consiglio da giocare anche ad oggi,a mio parere ,tra i due Half-life, il migliore.
Just buy it and play it all the way through already.

Had been playing this for many years (since 2008 - as Non-Steam [WON] though) and still it touches my mind to play it again. Such nostalgia...

Not forget combining some best modifications for it will increase the fun, new experiences and more challenges to get known to.
It's not as fresh as it once was, but it's still a great shooter with gameplay you can't find in any game since.

«Гра року» за версією понад 50 часописів, Half-Life — дебютна гра студії Valve, яка поєднує в собі бойовик, пригоду та визнану технологію, аби створити вражаюче реалістичний світ, де гравець повинен думати, аби вижити. Також містить захоплюючий мережевий режим, який дозволяє грати супроти друзів та інших гравців з усього світу.

The most iconic part of this game

"Good morning, and welcome to the Black Mesa transit system. 
This automated train is provided for the security and convenience of 
the Black Mesa Research Facility personnel. The time is 8:47 A.M. 
Current topside temperature is 93 degrees with an estimated high of 
105. The Black Mesa compound is maintained at a pleasant 68 degrees at 
all times. This train is inbound from level 3 dormitories to sector C 
test labs and control facilities. If your intended destination is a 
high security area beyond sector C, you will need to return to the 
central transit hub in area 9 and board a high security train. If you 
have not yet submitted your identity to the retinal clearance system, 
you must report to Black Mesa personnel for processing before you will 
be permitted into the high security branch of the transit system.

"Due to the high toxicity of material routinely handled in the Black 
Mesa compound, no smoking, eating, or drinking are permitted within the 
Black Mesa transit system. Please keep your limbs inside the train at 
all times. Do not attempt to open the doors until the train has come to 
a complete halt at the station platform. In the event of an emergency, 
passengers are to remain seated and await further instruction. If it is 
necessary to exit the train, disabled personnel should be evacuated 
first. Please, stay away from electrified rails and proceed to an 
emergency station until assistance arrives. "

A reminder: that the Black Mesa Hazard Course decathalon 
will commence this evening at 1900 hours in the Level 3 facility. The 
semi-finals for high security personnel will be announced in a separate 
secure broadcast transmission. Remember: more lives than yours may 
depend on your fitness.

"Do you have a friend or relative who would make a valuable addition to 
the Black Mesa Team? Immediate openings are available in the areas of: 
materials handling, and low clearance security. Please contact Black 
Mesa personnel for further information. If you have an associate with a 
background in the areas of: theoretical physics, biotechnology, or 
other high-tech disciplines, please contact our civilian recruiting 
team. The Black Mesa Facility is an equal opportunity employer. 

"A reminder to all Black Mesa personnel: regular radiation and 
biohazard screenings are a requirement of continued employment in the 
Black Mesa Research Facility. Missing a scheduled urinalysis or 
radiation checkup is grounds for immediate termination. If you feel you 
have been exposed to radioactive or other hazardous materials in the 
course of your duties, contact your radiation safety officer 
immediately. Work safe, work smart. Your future depends on it."

"Now arriving at sector C test labs and control facilities. 
Please stand back from the automated door, and wait for the security 
officer to verify your identity. Before exiting the train, be sure to 
check your area for personal belongings. Thank you, and have a very 
safe and productive day."

Half Life is not just a game. It is an experiance. An experiance that everyone must enjoy. Obviously I had heard about the Half Life series with great reccomendation and I got the game with high expectations. Those expectations have been shattered. The amazing gameplay kept me glued to my screen, the fantastic and mystic story kept me wanting more every second, and the overall atmosphere of the entire game brought me in and never let me go.  The greatest part of Half Life is the originality and effort Valve put into this entire project and how much it payed off. Valve's debut game is not merely an enjoyable game, but a historic game and should be an example for all great and story rich games. Along with all of that, and the horror undertone, smooth gameplay, mesmerizing graphics, tough enemies, and of course the nearly impossible puzzles make this game what it is: a masterpiece.
